parameters.name: IsDirectional
parameters.description: Whether to project in one direction: 0 projects in both directions 1 projects in one direction

parameters.name: FlipDir
parameters.description: Whether to project along the normal to the sketch plane; valid only when isDirectional = 1: 0 projects in a direction opposite to the normal of the sketch plane 1 projects along the normal of the sketch plane

title: IModelDoc2.InsertSplitLineProject
description: Splits a face by projecting sketch lines onto the face.
signature:
void InsertSplitLineProject( 
   System.Boolean
IsDirectional
,
   System.Boolean
FlipDir
)

parameters.name: IsDirectional
parameters.description: Whether to project in one direction: 0 projects in both directions 1 projects in one direction

parameters.name: FlipDir
parameters.description: Whether to project along the normal to the sketch plane; valid only when isDirectional = 1: 0 projects in a direction opposite to the normal of the sketch plane 1 projects along the normal of the sketch plane

remarks:
The sketch to project must be selected using
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
with a mark value of 4.
The faces to split must be selected using IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2 with mark values of 1.
